title: Error compiling: "error compiling cython file"
body:
Hi there, when trying to compile, following the [build instructions](https://github.com/mozilla/TTS/wiki/Build-instructions-for-server) I run into the following error.

`python setup.py bdist_wheel --checkpoint ../checkpoint_630000.pth.tar --model_config ../config.json
Embedding model in wheel file...
Compiling ./TTS/tts/layers/glow_tts/monotonic_align/core.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/TestCyUtilityLoader.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/TestCythonScope.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CpdefEnums.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CppConvert.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/MemoryView.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Runtime/refnanny.pyx because it depends on /home/user/local/moz-tts/TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Includes/cpython/type.pxd.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy/random/_examples/cython/extending.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy/random/_examples/cython/extending_distributions.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/TestCyUtilityLoader.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/TestCythonScope.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CpdefEnums.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CppConvert.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/MemoryView.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Runtime/refnanny.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy/random/_examples/cython/extending.pyx because it changed.
Compiling ./lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy/random/_examples/cython/extending_distributions.pyx because it changed.
[ 1/19] Cythonizing ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx

Error compiling Cython file:
\------------------------------------------------------------
...
    PyTypeObject *Py_TYPE(obj)
    bint PyMapping_Check(obj)
    object PyErr_Format(exc, const char *format, ...)

@cname("{{funcname}}")
cdef {{struct_type}} {{funcname}}(obj) except *:
    ^
\------------------------------------------------------------

TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx:11:5: Expected an identifier, found '{'

Error compiling Cython file:
\------------------------------------------------------------
...
    PyTypeObject *Py_TYPE(obj)
    bint PyMapping_Check(obj)
    object PyErr_Format(exc, const char *format, ...)

@cname("{{funcname}}")
cdef {{struct_type}} {{funcname}}(obj) except *:
     ^
\------------------------------------------------------------

TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx:11:6: Syntax error in C variable declaration
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 123, in <module>
    ext_modules=find_cython_extensions(),
  File "setup.py", line 64, in find_cython_extensions
    exts = cythonize(find_pyx(path), language_level=3)
  File "/home/user/local/moz-tts/TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1102, in cythonize
    cythonize_one(*args)
  File "/home/user/local/moz-tts/TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1225, in cythonize_one
    raise CompileError(None, pyx_file)
Cython.Compiler.Errors.CompileError: ./TTS/lib/python3.8/site-packages/Cython/Utility/CConvert.pyx
`
